name: 辜炳達
objective: 本課程旨為引導學生研究自20世紀初到第二次世界大戰西方文學的觀點。藉由閱讀現代主義者所創作的詩詞、散文及戲劇性文學，欣賞同時期的畫作、電影與音樂，進而研究與討論文學文化以期培養學生的對文學文化的欣賞。
schedule:
W1              Introduction to the course
W2-W3       Intro to Cultural Studies
W4              Paris, the Capital of Modernity 
W5-W6       Midnight in Paris
W7-W10     The Great Gatsby
W14-W17   Nightwood
W18            Final Presentation
scorePolicy:
In-class personal presentations 30%
Final presentations 30%
Research paper 40%
materials:
https://pingtaku.wixsite.com
David Harvey, Paris, Capital of Modernity
Djuna Barnes, Nightwood
F. Scott Fitzgerald, The Great Gatsby
James Joyce, Ulysses
Woody Allen, Midnight in Paris
